title: Petaloconchus floridanus
text:
Petaloconchus floridanus is a <a href="species">species</a> of <a href="sea%20snail">sea snail</a>, a <a href="marine%20%28ocean%29">marine</a> <a href="gastropod">gastropod</a> <a href="mollusk">mollusk</a> in the <a href="family%20%28biology%29">family</a> <a href="Vermetidae">Vermetidae</a>, the worm snails or worm shells.
Description.
The maximum recorded <a href="gastropod%20shell">shell</a> length is 31 mm.
Habitat.
Minimum recorded depth is 0 m. Maximum recorded depth is 73 m.
